meanings.definition: Holding the attention or interest intensely
meanings.sent1: The gripping movie kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent2: The book had a gripping storyline that I couldn't put down.
meanings.sent3: The gripping plot twist made me gasp in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her gripping performance in the play moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent5: The gripping suspense in the story made it unforgettable.
